description: Protect your favorite gadgets with a screen protector! Guards against scratches, smears, dust and dirt, and keeps your LCD screen in perfect condition. This LCD Screen Protector provides a full coverage from dust and scratches. Screen protectors provide crystal-clear visibility and do not interfere with touch-screen operation. Fits the Asus Eee Pad Transformer TF 101 screen. Easy to apply and can be removed and washed for reuse, without leaving residue behind!Includes: 3 Pieces Asus Eee Pad Transformer TF101 Screen Protector
title: GreatShield Ultra Smooth Clear Screen Protector Film for Asus Eee Pad Transformer TF101 (3 Pack)
